section.title: Topic type matters less in policy and procedure documents
General task topics contact section titles, which ar every useful for migrating content
Section titles allow looser writing like the STOP Report
You only need to specialise the one topic type you will use the most
section.p: The specialised topic for profiling will need to be maintained if you update your version of oXygen (always a good idea, since the features and the webhelp options are continually improving. Although specialising the topic type is a strightforward, mechanical expersice, it's still unplreasant and will involve testing. It;s just uncesseccary work to specialisetopicsthat you won;t use, and neater and safer not too.
